It was a lot smoother than the other iTunes video.  Almost as good as the videos eztv puts up.

Very watchable, but still waiting for the 720p. I'm curious about the non-standard 29fps. The standard NTSC framerate and the usual framerate for MB episodes is 29.976fps. If whatever software that was used to capture this only allows integer framerates, 30fps would have made a lot more sense.
I do not notice any audio offset by the way.
